about.about_hero_text: We help people around the world build professional CVs that open new doors for their careers.
about.about_story_text: CVFlow was born with a simple mission: to make creating resumes easy, elegant, and accessible for everyone.
about.about_vision_text: To become the global leader in resume design, helping millions of professionals showcase their skills effectively.
about.about_mission_text: Provide simple, modern, and customizable CV templates to empower people to achieve their career dreams.
about.about_testimonial_1: Thanks to CVFlow, I landed my dream job in just 2 weeks. The templates are amazing!
about.about_testimonial_2: As a freelancer, I now design CVs for clients easily and earn a steady income. Highly recommended!
about.about_cta_title: Ready to create your professional CV?

freelanceGuide.title: How to start your freelance business creating resumes for clients?
freelanceGuide.subtitle: A practical guide to starting your freelance project with clear and simple steps
freelanceGuide.idea_text: You can offer CV creation services to job seekers or those looking to update their CVs, using our professional, ready-made templates. Then, deliver them in PDF format with an attractive, organized design for a fee.
steps_list: Register on our platform to create a free account.
Browse the templates and choose the most suitable one for each client based on their specialty.
Ask the client for his professional, educational and skills data.
Easily fill out the template with the editing tool.
Download your CV as a high-quality PDF file.
Deliver it to the customer via WhatsApp or email after receiving the money.
freelanceGuide.pricing_title: How do you price your service?
freelanceGuide.pricing_text: You can set the service price based on your experience and professional formatting. Initially, it's recommended to price the service between 5 - 15 $ per resume, depending on the complexity of the design and the time required.
freelanceGuide.where_title: Where do you offer your service?
where_list: Facebook groups for employment and job seekers.
Instagram by posting professional CV templates of your own design.
WhatsApp via contacts or professional groups.
Freelancing platforms such as Khamsat or Mostaqil.

templatesSection.title: What will you design today?
templatesSection.subtitle: Choose the type of CV or design that suits you from hundreds of ready-made templates and start customizing right away.

videoHero.title: Design your CV easily and professionally
videoHero.subtitle: Create a CV that stands out in just a few steps, with no design skills required. Choose from professional templates, customize them as you like, then share or download instantly.

whySection.title: A CV that sets you apart
whySection.subtitle: Did you know that 7 out of 10 candidates get rejected because of an unprofessional CV? We‚Äôre here to change that. With CVFlow you can create a CV that grabs attention and reflects your skills in the best way possible.
bullets: üöÄ Boost your chances of landing an interview

freelanceSection.title: What are you waiting for? Start your freelance journey now
freelanceSection.freelance_intro:
Did you know that there are thousands of people who have great skills but lack the simplest thing to reach customers‚Ä¶ Professional CV?

Many of them are not good at writing or designing their CVs in an attractive way, which prevents them from finding profitable freelance opportunities every day.

Here lies Your chance.

Using our simple tools and ready-made templates, you can easily create professional resumes for these people and offer them for a reasonable fee.

Imagine that every resume you design could open a new job for its owner ‚Äì while opening up an additional source of ongoing income for you.

üí° Start now, and invest your design and writing skills to create distinctive CVs and sell them to those who need them most.

refund_policy.title: Refund Policy
refund_policy.intro: We always strive to provide the best experience for our customers; however, certain circumstances may require a refund. Below are the policy details clearly and smoothly.

section1.title: Refund Request Conditions
section1.item1: The user is unable to access the service after payment.
section1.item2: The user does not receive the agreed-upon features.
section1.item3: A critical technical error occurs that prevents using the service.

section3.title: Refund Process
section3.item1: Your request will be reviewed within 3‚Äì7 business days.
section3.item2: You will be notified via email.
section3.item3: The amount will be refunded using the same original payment method.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: For any inquiry or refund request, contact us via email:

section1.title: Acceptance of Terms
section1.text: By using the website, you agree to all displayed terms and policies.

section3.title: Content and Ownership
section3.item1: All templates and designs are owned by the website.
section3.item2: Reselling templates without permission is prohibited.

section4.title: User Account
section4.text: The user is responsible for maintaining their login data, and we reserve the right to suspend the account in case of suspicious activity.

section5.title: Subscriptions and Payments
section5.item1: Payments are final after generating the resume.
section5.item2: Features may change according to updates.

section6.title: Modifications
section6.text: The website reserves the right to modify the terms at any time with user notification.

section3.title: Data Protection
section3.text: We use the latest security systems to prevent unauthorized access.

section5.title: Data Deletion
section5.text: The user has the right to delete their account and all of their data completely.

section1.title: How Referrals Work
section1.item1: The user receives a unique referral link.
section1.item2: Every new user who registers through the link is considered a referral.

section2.title: Reward System
section2.item1: 20% of the subscription value of each referred user.
section2.item2: Rewards are added to the balance or transferred as agreed.

section3.title: Conditions
section3.item1: The referred user must be completely new.
section3.item2: Creating multiple accounts for the same person is prohibited.
section3.item3: Posting the referral link in misleading or illegal places is prohibited.
